entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
